FunctionDefinition.Name: add
FunctionDefinition.Description: Adds two numbers or two telemetry streams.

FunctionDefinition.Name: div
FunctionDefinition.Description: Divides two numbers or two telemetry streams.

FunctionDefinition.Name: Filter
FunctionDefinition.Description: Filters telemetry streams in a telemetry stream collection.

Parameter.Name: telemetryStream
Parameter.Description: The telemetry stream collection to be filtered.

Parameter.Name: rankFunction
Parameter.Description: Specifies how to order the streams. One of 'Avg|Max|Min|Last|Delta|SimpleDelta'

Parameter.Name: cutoffMode
Parameter.Description: Specifies how to filter the ordered streams. One of 'Above|Below|Top|Bottom|TopPercent|BottomPercent'

Parameter.Name: cutoffValue
Parameter.Description: A number representing a cutoff or threshold value.

FunctionDefinition.Name: FilterZero
FunctionDefinition.Description: Filters out all zero streams in a telemetry stream

Parameter.Name: telemetryStream
Parameter.Description: The telemetry stream collection whose stream elements are to be filtered.

FunctionDefinition.Name: idempotent
FunctionDefinition.Description: Returns the passed number or telemetry stream unchanged.

FunctionDefinition.Name: mul
FunctionDefinition.Description: Multiplies two numbers or two telemetry streams.

FunctionDefinition.Name: sub
FunctionDefinition.Description: Subtracts two numbers or two telemetry streams.
